com.bumptech.glide.presenter
Class ThumbImagePresenter<A,B>

java.lang.Object
  com.bumptech.glide.presenter.ThumbImagePresenter<A,B>
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImagePresenter.ImagePresenterCoordinator
public class ThumbImagePresenter<A,B>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImagePresenter.ImagePresenterCoordinator

Wraps a pair of ImagePresenter objects and uses them to load and display an image and a thumbnail for that image. The image load is started first. If the image load does not return synchronously (ie if the image is not cached), then the thumbnail load is started. If the thumbnail load does not return synchronously, the placeholder image is shown. If the thumbnail load completes before the image load (expected in most cases), the thumbnail is shown until the image load completes. If the image load completes first, the thumbnail will never be shown.

Nested Class Summary
static class ThumbImagePresenter.Builder<A,B>
          A builder for a ThumbImagePresenter.

Method Detail

setModels

public void setModels(A fullModel,
                      B thumbModel)
Sets models to load the full and thumb image. If the load for fullModel finishes before the one for thumbModel then only the full image will be shown

See Also:
ImagePresenter.setModel(Object)
